sentence.idiomatic: The dog snuck outside.
How could you peek at my diary?
Close the door. I'm afraid someone is eavesdropping.
Where did you hide my video game console?
We hid the snacks. Don't let the teacher see.
Kitty is hiding, I can't find her.
What's that scent on your body? Perfume?
I don't like this flavor.
The food at this shop tastes pretty good, and it isn't expensive.
Potato chips are high in calories. If you eat a lot you'll get fat.
Is watermelon a low calorie fruit?
Let's jog. Jogging can burn calories.
Can you take me home?
Did today's newspaper get delivered?
Mom wants to send me to the United States to attend university.
Athletes train every day for six hours.
These past few days has the training been tiring?
These dogs are all trained police dogs.
Fatty, you are sneaking food again!
No! No, I'm not!
Quit hiding it and let me see! All right, you... eating potato chips again! What is that?
Cola.
Who let you buy that?
I haven't eaten these things in ages. I'm about to lose it, I'm so hungry.
If you are hungry, just eat an apple. What are you doing eating that junk food?
Apples have no taste.
Look how fat you are. If you sneak anymore high calorie things, I'm going to send you to fat camp!
